description:
Financial Calculator for Windows

ESBFinCalc Pro is a Financial Calculator that aims to provide a sophisticated yet easy to use tool to perform Financial Calculations including Simple Interest, Compound Interest, Investments, Loans, Annuities, Depreciation, Coupon Dates and other features. Supports full Precedence, Logging of Results, Clipboard Support, Integrated Help, and much more. For those who don't like Precedence of Operators, that can also be turned off.
